mechanics.trigger: Cast spell, choose 'Create Water' option, target open container
mechanics.condition: Target is an open container within 30ft range
mechanics.outcome: Create up to 10 gallons of clean water within the container

mechanics.trigger: Cast spell, choose 'Create Water' option, target area
mechanics.condition: Target is a 30-foot cube within 30ft range
mechanics.outcome: Water falls as rain within the 30-foot cube

mechanics.trigger: Cast spell, choose 'Destroy Water' option, target open container
mechanics.condition: Target is an open container within 30ft range containing water
mechanics.outcome: Destroy up to 10 gallons of water within the container

mechanics.trigger: Cast spell, choose 'Destroy Water' option, target area
mechanics.condition: Target is a 30-foot cube within 30ft range containing fog

description_text: You either create or destroy water. Create Water. You create up to 10 gallons of clean water within range in an open container. Alternatively, the water falls as rain in a 30-foot cube within range. Destroy Water. You destroy up to 10 gallons of water in an open container within range. Alternatively, you destroy fog in a 30-foot cube within range.
